title: Hubby, Please Spare Me - Novel Updates
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day
author: Canmiao Aiyu   灿淼爱鱼
description:
For Miaomiao, the most intelligent thing she had done in her life was to climb through the window, crawled into the bed of a stranger, and conceived a brilliant and lovely child.
The stupidest thing she had ever done was to provoke Shen Mochen, who is a god-like existence.>
